snippet: The behavior of some individuals at the tax agency is inexcusable. What it reveals about our election laws is worse.
abstract: The behavior of some individuals at the tax agency is inexcusable. What it reveals about our election laws is worse.

headline.main: Behind the I.R.S. Mess: A Campaign-Finance Scandal
